content:
Dear [Wife's Name],

I wanted to take a moment to apologize for using Chat GPT to write your Valentine's poem. While my intentions were to express my love and admiration for you, I now realize that it wasn't the most thoughtful or genuine way to do so.

You are such an important person in my life, and I should have taken the time to write something myself that truly came from the heart. I understand that it may have been disappointing to receive a poem that wasn't entirely my own work, and for that, I am truly sorry.

I promise to make it up to you by taking the time to express my feelings to you in a more personal and meaningful way in the future. I want to let you know that I love and cherish you, and I hope that you can forgive me for my mistake.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
